Good humored, cooperative, competitive torture, for the purposes of exploring strategies, design, progess and history of gaming

Rules of Zargon

Membership

  • You may invite new members to join in gaming but they are your responsibility
  • If the group at large does not like a guest then that guest may not be allowed at future events

Gaming specific

  • If you're going to continue complaining about a particular game, then you must provide a considerable alternative or suffice to stop complaining.
  • If after more than one explanation and a video tutorial and you still do not comprehend a particular game, perhaps it's not the game for you.
  • If a game seems broken, more over consistently so, and by continued review it appears to be just only you experiencing this, maybe the game isn't for you.
